titleStmt.title: Two brief meditations I. Of magnanimitie under crosses: II. of acquaintance with God. By E.W. Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Waterhouse, Edward, 1619-1670.

notesStmt.note: "Divine meditations on acquaintance with God" (also published separately as Wing W1045) has separate dated title page, register and pagination.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
